content.rendered:
Intentional…

Ordinarily, the middle of the year – June, like we are in right now is usually a re-inventing period. It is that moment you sort of go back to your diary drafts and re-read all those things we love to call resolutions at the beginning of the year.

Most at times, one thing has happened by now; you are well on the path you destined to be at the year top or you aren’t doing so well. Then there’s the third possibility, maybe you are confused by now. Where are you?

Here’s one analogy I love about the journey of life:

That the road we travel is one long and uncertain one. At the middle of the road (call it June), there stands two sign posts on opposite ends. One (facing the direction you are headed) says “Road Unclear” and the one towards the opposite side says “Bumpy and Rough”. This is the ‘June’ point we all have right? The past isn’t so good but it is a devil we know better than the road untraveled, and so our minds are sent on a wild decision trip, should I or should I not?

Intentional…

A friend of mine puts it this way ‘It is safer to ride towards the direction of the waves and not against it.’

Who are you? The kind that is intrigued by money, fame, love, or the feeling that tomorrow should just turn out better? If you are the last person, then you are me (insert smiling emoji), but of course hoping that all the other good things follow along the way.

I am intentional about not choosing the light against the darkness, but being the light in the dark or better still… how about when the darkness starts creeping in, we draw our shadows with some light and then boom! we are destined for the billboards.

Enjoy the Intentional Shoot with the beautiful Remmy Majala, as you get intentional to draw your shadow in the light. I will be here, right beside you.

While at it, see more of our celebrity shoots here https://bit.ly/3NdPgtu

See you soon.
